title: Lucy's Fried Chicken script font/sign-lettering style
content:
Just wondering what this (or the closest) font is? On the logo for Lucy's Fried Chicken by Pentagram.

[Lucy's Fried Chicken](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.pentagram.com/work/#/all/all/newest/2660/).

Clearly may well be a custom job, or at least a customised version of an existing typeface, but I have been looking for something similar as a starting point to my own hand-lettered logo job. For inspiration purposes really!

Thank you.
author: geedee

comments.content: Could be custom. Some I like as alternatives: Doyald Young's [Home Run](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run)/ [Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.linotype.com/148404/eclat-family.html), LHF [Royal Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/royalscript.php)/ [Goldsmith Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/goldsmithscript.php), [Machiarge](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/machiarge), [Pivo](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/pivo), [Delicious](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/yes-please/delicious-pro), MAWNS [Motion Picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/motion-picture)/ [Intrigue Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/intrique-script), [Lobster](http://web.archive.org/web/20140716105015/http:/www.impallari.com/lobster)
Thanks so much for the suggestions!
